problem_text_cn: 如图,AB为半圆的直径,其AB=4,半圆绕点B顺时针旋转45°,点A旋转到A′的位置,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of the semicircle, AB = N_0, the semicircle rotates clockwise around vertex B by N_1, and vertex A rotates to the position of A′, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵半圆AB绕点B顺时针旋转45°,点A旋转到A′的位置,∴S_{半圆AB}=S_{半圆A′B},∠ABA′=45°,∵S_{阴影部分}+S_{半圆AB}=S_{半圆A′B}+S_{扇形ABA′},∴S_{阴影部分}=S_{扇形ABA′}=\frac{45π×4^{2}}{360}=2π．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是扇形面积的计算,熟记扇形的面积公式是解答此题的关键．
